topic.title: Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 Plan of Care moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) STATIC (CONF:8573)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8575)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 Plan of Care moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) STATIC (CONF:8573)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8575)
Contains exactly one [1..1] consumable, where its type is Consumable

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <substanceadministration xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="SBADM"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"/> <id root="1792506923"/> <effectiveTime value="20120325"/> <consumable/> </substanceadministration>

p.ph: Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration
